posts.post_content:
Shipping is $3 regardless of how many raw cards you want

I can ship 2 graded cards for $3, but need to add $1 to each graded card after the second.

All are Recruit 240 backs unless noted as a 606.

Please send me an email if you'd like to see scans.  Too many to list here.
